job.title: Senior Data Science Machine Learning Engineer - Telecommute
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Hospital & Health Care
job.description: If you want to achieve more in your mission of health care you have to be really smart about the business of health care Challenge yourself your peers and our industry by shaping what health care looks like and doingstrong your lifes best worksmbrbrstrongWere looking for a Senior Machine Learning Engineer to design new data infrastructures and using that infrastructure to deploy machine learning solutions In this role you will directly contribute to our mission by working 70 engineering and 30 machine learningdata science building AIML systems models and infrastructure that increases the quality performance accuracy and effectiveness of our products Additional responsibility is to support machine learning efforts including tools design pipeline maintenance and upgrades as well identifying current and future bottlenecks of the systembrbrAs a Machine Learning Engineer on the team you will build data and tools that enable analytics to inform product and engineering teams at scalebrbrYoull enjoy the flexibility to telecommute from anywhere within the US as you take on some tough challengesbrbrstronguPrimary Responsibilitiesbrustrongul liYou have engineered metrics and statistical information out of massive and complex datasets eg Spark MLlib Druid Solr Kafkali liYou have built robust feature extraction and ML training pipelines and have a keen eye for where to automate eg Oozie Airflowli liYou have done prototypetoproduction development of ML models You care about improving training performance by researching into latest algorithms You also value scaling inferences by utilizing CPUGPU resources in parallelized fashion and have a strong foundation in data structures and optimization algorithmsli liYou are knowledgeable in classic machine learning algorithms SVM Random Forest Naive Bayes KNN etc Good understanding of biasvariance tradeoff regularization dimension reductionli liYou have some experience in modern deep learning techniques via packages such as KerasTensorflowli ulul liSoftware engineering fundamentals version control systems ie Git Github and workflows and ability to write productionready codeli ulul liParticipating in the engineering lifecycle including designing highquality ML infrastructure and data pipelines writing production code conducting code reviews and working alongside our infrastructure and reliability teamsli liYou care about data generating processes not just modeling them but understanding the actual human and computational behavior from which data emergesli liYou are fluent in at least one programming language eg Python Scala and are comfortable developing code within a team environment eg Github testing code reviewsli liYou are selfmotivated and curious You continue to learn on the jobli liYou have demonstrated creative and critical thinking with an innate drive to improve how things workli liYou have a high tolerance for ambiguity You find a way through You anticipate You connect and synthesizeli liYou can influence decisions with excellent verbal and written communication skillsli liDesign and create environments for data scientists to build models and manipulate datali liWork within client systems to extract data and place it within an analytical environmentli liLearn and understand customer technology environments and systemsli liDefine the deployment approach and infrastructure for models and be responsible for ensuring that businesses can use the models we developli liReveal the true value of data by working with data scientists to manipulate and transform data into appropriate formats in order to deploy actionable machine learning modelsli liPartner with data scientists to ensure solution deployability at scale in harmony with existing business systems and pipelines and such that the solution can be maintained throughout its life cycleli liCreate operational testing strategies validate and test the model in QA and ensure the quality of the delivered productli brbrulYoull be rewarded and recognized for your performance in an environment that will challenge you and give you clear direction on what it takes to succeed in your role as well as provide development for other roles you may be interested inbrbrstronguRequired Qualificationsbrustrongul liBachelors degree in Computer Engineering or a related fieldli li5 years experience as a Machine Learning Engineer Software Engineer or Data Engineerli li3 years Python Scala or Javali li3 years experience writing SQL to debug and optimize distributed SQL queriesli liExperience deploying data science models in a production settingli liExperience working with and productionizing machine learning algorithms SVM Random Forest Naive Bayes KNN etcli liExperience building robust data pipelines using a variety of data sources programming languages and toolsetsli liHandson experience in one or more big data ecosystem productslanguages such as Spark and Kafkali liExperience working within operating systems eg Linux and storage systems eg Azure Databricks GCPli liExperience with software development lifecycle experience including design documentation with experience translating business requirements and use cases into a data solution including ingestion of many data sources ETL processing data access and consumption as well as custom analyticsli liExperience presenting and communicating to internal and external customersclientsstakeholdersli liIf you need to enter a work site for any reason you will be required to screen for symptoms using the ProtectWell mobile app Interactive Voice Response ie entering your symptoms via phone system or similar UnitedHealth Groupapproved symptom screener When in a UnitedHealth Group building employees are required to wear a mask in common areas In addition employees must comply with any state and local masking ordersli brbrulstronguPreferred Qualificationsbrustrongul liA Masters or other advanced degree in data science or a related fieldli liHandson experience with one or more ecosystem technologies eg HBase Impala Solr Kudu Streamsets NiFi ElasticSearch Databricks Snowflake AWSAzureGCPli liRelevant side projects eg contributions to an open source technology stackli liExperience working with Data ScienceMachine Learning software and libraries such as h2o TensorFlow Keras scikitlearn etcli liExperience with Docker Kubernetes or some other containerization technologyli liAWS Sagemaker MLFlow experienceli brbrulstrongCareers at UnitedHealth Group strongWe have modest goals Improve the lives of others Change the landscape of health care forever Leave the world a better place than we found it Such aspirations tend to attract a certain type of person Crazy talented Compassionate Driven To these select few we offer the global reach resources and cando culture of a Fortune 6 company We provide an environment where youre empowered to be your best We encourage you to take risks And we offer a world of rewards and benefits for performance We believe the most important is the opportunity to dostrong your lifes best worksmbrbrstrongstrongColorado Residents Only strongThe salary range for Colorado residents is 79700 to 142600 Pay is based on several factors including but not limited to education work experience certifications etc As of the date of this posting In addition to your salary UHG offers the following benefits for this position subject to applicable eligibility requirements Health dental and vision plans wellness program flexible spending accounts paid parking or public transportation costs 401k retirement plan employee stock purchase plan life insurance shortterm disability insurance and longterm disability insurance business travel accident insurance Employee Assistance Program PTO and employeepaid critical illness and accident insurancebrbrliAll Telecommuters will be required to adhere to UnitedHealth Groups Telecommuter PolicybrbrliemDiversity
